betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Steam Machines accept Steam into their internal storage tank, piped from Boilers.

Steam machines will run recipes from JEI up to §aUsage: 32 EU/t (LV)§r. EU may be the Energy Unit for Electric machines, but the Steam machines will run using a proportional amount of steam.
Regular Steam Machines are §9twice as slow§r as indicated by JEI.
High Pressure Steam Machines are the same speed as indicated by JEI, with adjusted steam consumption. You will unlock them once you obtain §dSteel§r.


After each recipe, the Steam machines will vent some cooler steam (particles) from the side with the square. This is the exhaust port.
§cImportant:§r Keep the exhaust port unblocked, this is neither an input nor an output slot! If the machine fails to vent steam, it will stop working.
§9Reminder:§r Use your Wrench to change which side the exhaust port is facing (right-click).

§o
If you feel like sending yourself off to Heaven, I invite you to stand on top of pipes transporting steam, or you can also stand right in front of the vent as the machines are running recipes.§r
